Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: â€¢ People, listen up! The economic world is ablaze with news that the Reserve Bank of Australia has finally kept an unchanged rate and also hinted, rather ominously, that it 'may' go up again. This wait-and-see strategy came after the positive job figures, which created a storm in a teacup for economists, who now predict a rate hike. To add insult to injury, smokers are causing a loss of $5bn to the federal budget, and it doesn't stop there, mortgage holders - brace yourselves - you'll soon be shelling out an ungodly amount on record-high repayments.
